page.title: 14Law & Order Around Braydon
page.content: This is a very scattered community and has no real problems with maintaining law and order. The local police, stationed in Purton village, patrols Pavenhill on foot making his presence known and stopping to talk to anyone on his beat. He also patrols the larger area but this is by car, waiting at the crossroads to show a police presence. There is great emphasis on a local community police force and generally the people of this area are very willing to accept the regular presence of the police and will talk to them willingly.
